title: Introduction to Physical AI and Embodied Intelligence
description: This chapter introduces the fundamental concepts of Physical AI and embodied intelligence, exploring how robots perceive, reason, and act in the real world. We will cover the historical context, current trends, and future directions of this rapidly evolving field.

frontMatter.title: Introduction to Physical AI and Embodied Intelligence
